name: Playing With Snow
description:
This is a Christmas themed game directly inspired by Bomberman and Playing with Fire 2.

Controls:

Player 1  (Movement: wasd, Drop Bulbs: g, Pick-up bulbs: g, Throw bulb: g)

Player 2  (Movement: left, right, up, down, Drop Bulbs: L, Pick-up bulbs: L, Throw bulb: L)

Powerups:

Christmas Tree (Capacity): Increases the number of ornaments you can place

Coffee Mug (Speed): Increases your movement speed

Candy Cane (Throw): Increases the distance you can throw a bulb

Santa (Range): Increases the total size of the explosion
